posts.post_content:
In comparison to [Palladia-Mors](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Palladia-Mors), he has better art, better flavor, better story...  
But no trample. If you are not cheating him out early(go you), or putting trample giving cards in the deck([soulbright flamekin](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=soulbright flamekin)?), or giving him the tim ability, he just isn't better. Trample is so crazy powerful that it hurts my soul to see badasses like this stopped by a falcon.
posts.html:

Posted By: DodgeBungalow (6/3/2013 6:29:19 PM)

posts.post_content: Note that unlike say, [Crosis](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Crosis), Nicol Bolas doesn't say combat damage. This means he can ping an enemy with [Power of Fire](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Power of Fire), [Fire Whip](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Fire Whip), or [Viridian Longbow](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Viridian Longbow) and still force them to discard their entire hand. Pretty strong.
posts.html:
Note that unlike say, Crosis, Nicol Bolas doesn't say combat damage. This means he can ping an enemy with Power of Fire, Fire Whip, or Viridian Longbow and still force them to discard their entire hand. Pretty strong.

posts.post_content: On the subject of Nicol Bolas not having trample, it just isn't flavorful for that ability to be on his card. Some .5/.5 [Little Girl](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Little Girl) enchanted with [Flight](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Flight) blocking his path to her planeswalker master? Well Nicol Bolas is going to completely and totally annihilate her, reanimate her, manipulate her, and then annihilate her again before moving on to bigger game.
